blogPost.excerpt: fireflies.ai & x.ai have partnered to automate the entire meeting process from scheduling to note-taking 📣 record & transcribe your x.ai meetings 🔍 search back through your conversations 📝 share recaps & notes with your team
blogPost.body: fireflies.ai & x.ai have partnered to automate the entire meeting process from scheduling to note-taking 📣 record & transcribe your x.ai meetings 🔍 search back through your conversations 📝 share recaps & notes with your team
blogPost.title: fireflies.ai + x.ai - Record & transcribe meetings scheduled via x.ai
blogPost.author: Krish Ramineni

localize.description: fireflies.ai与x.ai合作，将整个会议流程自动化，从日程安排到记录 📣记录和抄录x.ai会议 🔍搜索回溯您的对话 📝与您的团队分享总结和笔记。
localize.tagline: 通过x.ai记录和抄写预定的会议。

localize.description: fireflies.ai與x.ai合作，將整個會議流程自動化，從日程安排到記錄 📣記錄和抄錄x.ai會議 🔍搜索回溯您的對話 📝與您的團隊分享總結和筆記。
localize.tagline: 通過x.ai記錄和抄寫預定的會議。

previous.excerpt: Papercups EU is an open source live customer chat tool that is hosted in the EU for GDPR compliance purposes. We provide React/React Native/Flutter/HTML chat components for a ton of flexibility and customizability.
previous.title: Papercups EU - Open source live chat tool hosted in EU

localize.description: Papercups EU 是一个开源的即时客户聊天工具，出于 GDPR 合规性的目的，它被托管在欧盟。我们提供React/React Native/Flutter/HTML聊天组件，提供大量的灵活性和可定制性。
localize.tagline: 开源的即时聊天工具，托管在欧盟

localize.description: Papercups EU 是一個開源的即時客戶聊天工具，出於 GDPR 合規性的目的，它被託管在歐盟。我們提供React/React Native/Flutter/HTML聊天組件，提供大量的靈活性和可定製性。
localize.tagline: 開源的即時聊天工具，託管在歐盟

next.excerpt: Kintell is a platform that connects people looking for advice with those qualified to give it, via paid and Pro Bono video consultations. Browse for an Advisor, book in a session, and speak to them via the Kintell video platform.
next.title: Kintell - 1-to-1 video advice and tuition from vetted professionals

localize.description: Kintell是一个平台，通过付费和公益视频咨询，将寻求建议的人与有资格提供建议的人联系起来。通过Kintell视频平台，浏览顾问，预订会话，并与他们交谈。
localize.tagline: 经过审核的专业人员提供1对1的视频建议和指导。

localize.description: Kintell是一個平臺，通過付費和公益視頻諮詢，將尋求建議的人與有資格提供建議的人聯繫起來。通過Kintell視頻平臺，瀏覽顧問，預訂會話，並與他們交談。
localize.tagline: 經過審覈的專業人員提供1對1的視頻建議和指導。
